9a07e725-006d-4a1b-a55b-6d60a21bab66.name: 战斗反射
9a07e725-006d-4a1b-a55b-6d60a21bab66.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

1918cd13-2921-4056-bd11-25a3fc46019a.name: 幸运
1918cd13-2921-4056-bd11-25a3fc46019a.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

d9640bf3-7c1c-4a62-ae2a-0a3d587f46a7.name: 标志性装备
d9640bf3-7c1c-4a62-ae2a-0a3d587f46a7.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

20cfa626-631e-4476-b24e-58dded210d22.name: 25 points from the following

4ba85c51-84a6-4836-8d89-c2a3f35c2052.name: 仆从
4ba85c51-84a6-4836-8d89-c2a3f35c2052.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

e42fbccc-389b-4df3-a3fa-4dcaa96fb8b3.name: 感同身受
e42fbccc-389b-4df3-a3fa-4dcaa96fb8b3.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

7007bb32-919a-453e-b5e0-7581aac6f64b.name: 感同身受
7007bb32-919a-453e-b5e0-7581aac6f64b.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

4fb499ef-10f1-462d-8d2f-f09e4afe1f7a.name: 感同身受
4fb499ef-10f1-462d-8d2f-f09e4afe1f7a.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

1f2e7bef-32f0-4552-8d86-849d5b8a5ba1.name: 感同身受
1f2e7bef-32f0-4552-8d86-849d5b8a5ba1.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

8093e450-761d-4140-b857-3e70f401ee42.name: 硬皮
8093e450-761d-4140-b857-3e70f401ee42.notes: 任何只需要接触皮肤的影响忽略此 DR

18803a52-bec0-49a8-bf17-3a094c26f780.name: 健康
18803a52-bec0-49a8-bf17-3a094c26f780.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

179c59c4-c37e-40e9-90dc-7edea0ea8d64.name: Fit, Very
179c59c4-c37e-40e9-90dc-7edea0ea8d64.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

a293b03a-29bf-454e-a191-b8cba2682e04.name: 高痛阈
a293b03a-29bf-454e-a191-b8cba2682e04.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

0f4fa903-1516-48ea-ada9-c6fb685b0c94.notes: @装备的价值能够超过起始财富@

22b5524d-e048-4a8d-a2e0-834e6762d577.name: 特殊能力
22b5524d-e048-4a8d-a2e0-834e6762d577.notes: @在非魔法世界有魔法力量、拥有来自未来 TL 的装备、给予你特殊能力@

6e362cac-c4a0-4248-a261-20865061155f.name: 慢速
6e362cac-c4a0-4248-a261-20865061155f.notes: 你每 12 小时额外恢复 1 HP

1123078d-f727-43a3-bc1e-147e537c80cd.name: 常规
1123078d-f727-43a3-bc1e-147e537c80cd.notes: 你每 1 小时额外恢复 1 HP

a4db4bb3-5c8f-487b-ac15-79304b344910.name: 快速
a4db4bb3-5c8f-487b-ac15-79304b344910.notes: 你每 1 分钟额外恢复 1 HP

869ca05c-3804-4018-8065-97f883dd2770.name: 高速
869ca05c-3804-4018-8065-97f883dd2770.notes: 你每 1 秒额外恢复 1 HP

bedb8b10-116b-4607-96fc-35a393bc3964.name: 极度
bedb8b10-116b-4607-96fc-35a393bc3964.notes: 你每 1 秒额外恢复 10 HP

6746d67f-0314-4dd5-a5f8-61c8bf6fe4ab.name: 影响人群
6746d67f-0314-4dd5-a5f8-61c8bf6fe4ab.notes: 几乎所有人，刨去@一大群人@

1c1197a4-14ee-4f8d-8a9b-24d57b2d550a.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

6f64849c-c5b6-48f1-973f-ac12c100d0e9.name: Luck, Extraordinary
6f64849c-c5b6-48f1-973f-ac12c100d0e9.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play; Replace normal luck

88671e3f-1085-4d7e-924d-53c709f644d3.name: 视力不良（远视）
88671e3f-1085-4d7e-924d-53c709f644d3.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

5f2a5c57-30ed-4691-9fc4-00f2a6dec734.name: 视力不良（近视）
5f2a5c57-30ed-4691-9fc4-00f2a6dec734.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

d5ee3376-d09a-4b40-b53d-472515348387.name: Choose -15 points from the following
d5ee3376-d09a-4b40-b53d-472515348387.notes: May choose from the other -15 point group too

83f6ec07-24db-4a8f-9591-b59d5167bd83.name: Choose -20 points from the following
83f6ec07-24db-4a8f-9591-b59d5167bd83.notes: May choose from the other -15 point groups too

3afed0b4-2901-4bca-81e4-2c3c388eda36.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。

c3ec7323-50ff-450a-81c9-02d1f33df881.name: Choose one more alternate
c3ec7323-50ff-450a-81c9-02d1f33df881.notes: This should be a different skill than the other melee weapon group
